subject: p14851532
History: Year old man with CHF with weight gain and dyspnea, evaluate for volume overload/pulm edema/effusion.
Findings: As compared to, interval worsening moderate pulmonary edema. Right moderate pleural effusion has also slightly increased. Small left effusion persists. Left lower lobe parenchymal opacity in the superior segment is now obscured by increasing pulmonary edema. Moderate cardiomegaly. No pneumothorax.
Impression: Worsening moderate pulmonary edema as well as right moderate effusion. Left lower lobe parenchymal opacity in the superior segment is now obscured by increasing pulmonary edema.
